definition: of or relating to an internet company, usually from a period in the late 1990s, a company that operates its business primarily on the internet using a URL that ends in .com
details:
adjective
- of or relating to an internet company, usually from a period in the late 1990s
= example: of or relating to an internet company, usually from a period in the late 1990s
noun
- a company that operates its business primarily on the internet using a URL that ends in .com
= example: a company that operates its business primarily on the internet using a URL that ends in .com
= synonyms: , dot com company
